name: Sanjay the duck
description:
It is the day after thanksgiving and Sanjay's  bestfriend gregory the turkey has been eaten! thankfully  the ancient turducken of death is good enough to  give you a key-block to get through doors  and he sent you to the under world to save gregory. 

sorry if there are  any performance issues.

Controls: A, D, and the Space bar

hit the inconsistencies in the door with the key-block to unlock them
